Price: $21.99 - $16.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:24 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Drink happier and healthier

How did we get our start?

WOPET was founded in 2015 in CA,USA,JP,EU at the same time, our version that brings joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.

Why do we love what we do?

WOPET team all love pets and technology and truly believe that every pet deserves a long and healthy life full of happiness and love.

What makes our products unique?

We are determined to create a boundless high-quality life for people with love and technology, and aimed at provide care for the value of life, and let pet owners get rid of the constraints of time and space.

W300 Cat Water Fountain

W500 pet fountain

Cat Water Fountain

Accessories for W300 and W300B

Automatic Pet Feeder

Boundless Love for Pets

WOPET vision is to bring joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world!

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.33 x 6.65 x 4.96 inches; 1.34 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ W300
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 21, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ WOPET
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B4NHRR6H
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Multiple Filtration：WOPET W300 pet water fountain has a triple filtration system. The sponge captures bulky contaminants like pet fur and debris. The ion exchange resin layer softens tap water, and the activated carbon removes nasty flavors and scents.Change the filter every 1 week will be more healthier!
BPA FREE & High-End Materials: Our W300 cat water fountain is BPA free, durable, and it’s easy to operate and clean,Make your pet fall in love with drinking water, no need to worry their health problem any longer.
Ultra-Quiet Pump: The pump is whisper-quiet and stays below 35 decibels. Low-voltage pump is reliable and usually lasts 2 years. The pump is detachable and replaceable.
Easy to Set Up and Clean: WOPET W300 cat drinking fountain is easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning and replacement. Note：the pet fountain Doesn’t come with a wall plug. It is recommended to use a 5V, 1A adapter or power bank to operate it.


At WOpet, we all love pets and technology. Our vision is to bring joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.




WOPET was founded in 2015 in USA,CA,JP,EU. Wopet will use its innovative scientific and technological capabilities and persistent sense of social responsibility to provide a more complete boundless pet loving experience for pet families around the world.

  • 2L Large Water Capacity
  • Dishwasher safe
  • Silent Running
  • User Manual*1
  • Brush*1
  • Filter*1

WOPET Pet Water Fountain is made of high quality ABS material, which is BPA-free, durable, safe and easy to assemble and clean.

2 Flow Designs could attract pets to drink more water.

Visible Water Level could check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

  • Please clean the water fountain every 3-4 days;
  • Please clean pumps every 2-4 weeks;
  • Please replace the filter every 2 weeks;
  • Please fill in water in time when the water level reaches Min.

Read more




Emergency Water Storage

With a water storage capacity of about 80ml, the water tray can still provide water for your pets when power outage occurs.

Visible Water Level

Check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

Two Drinking modes

Flower waterfall or gentle fountain let your pets to choose!

Read more



Cleaning the pump is essential to extend water fountain life and keep the water fresh. Please clean the pump at least every two weeks.

The steps of cleaning the pump

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the Pump Connector Rubber

Step 3. Remove the pump cover

Step 4. Remove the impeller

Step 5. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more


Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week. Especially the small grooves on the fountain can be cleaned every day. Small grooves are designed to filter impurities, allowing pets to drink healthier water.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl. The lowest water level is more than the water outlet of the pump.

4. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, Change the filter every 1 week will be healthier!

5. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

6. WOPET Never Authorized any sellers to sell official genuine filters. For your pet’s health and safety, please search “B0B5Q4N6Q2” to purchase the real WOPET W300 Filters,DO NOT use the cheap and pirated filters.

7.Make sure the filter is SOAKED, The water needs to flow through it and it will just spill over if the filter isn’t soaked thoroughly.

White Cat Fountain Gray Cat Fountain W500 Pet Fountain Stainless Steel Cat Fountain 4 Packs Replacement Filters 8 Packs Replacement Filters
Product Model W300 W300 W500 F10 For W500&W300 For W500&W300
Material ABS ABS ABS Stainless Steel
Noise Level ≤35dB ≤35dB ≤35dB ≤30dB
Water Tank Capacity 2L 2L 3.5L 2L
With LED light No No Yes Yes
